question: In 1950, the four-fold classification of the state put the erstwhile princely states with the legislature in which part?
explanation: In 1950, the four-fold classification of the state put the erstwhile princely states with the legislature in Part B. The name of the nine states are Hyderabad, Madhya Bharat, Mysore, Jammu and Kashmir, Patiala and East Punjab, Vindhya Pradesh, Travancore-Cochin, Saurashtra, Rajasthan.
